local_intent: Perceive bread, approach and finely align with retries, settle briefly, then verify end-effector is at the bread.
assumptions: Bread is on the table and plate is to its left
coherence_with_global: Matches global perception (visibility fallback + detect), moves above target, retries precise ApproachAndAlign, waits to settle, and verifies alignment via IsAt before subsequent yaw and push in the global plan.
